Lizwi Vilakazi (amụrụ na 15 Disemba 1969), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mba South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom na Five Fingers for Marseilles
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'obere  ọrụ na usoro telivishọn dị ka ihe nkiri Zone 14 na SABC1 na ihe nkiri e.tv 4Play: Sex Tips for Girls
Na telivishọn South Africa, a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ dị ka 'Teddy' na usoro ihe nkiri Vuzu Amp aYeYe
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ọrụ a, ọ gara n'ihu na-achịkwa na telivishọn South Africa na ọtụtụ usoro dị ka Isithembiso, Jacob's Cross, The Road na Umlilo.
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya maka obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ahụ dị ka 'onye na-eme ntụli aka'
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri na-akpali akpali nke South African Western Five Fingers for Marseilles nke Michael Matthews duziri
Ihe nkiri ahụ nwere nyocha dị mma ma egosipụtakwara ya n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa.
